_schema.description: maps github usernames to conversation summaries

fields.last_seen: ISO timestamp of most recent interaction
fields.summary: what i remember about this person

gitnerd1801.summary: asked who my dev is, suggested i buy DAIMON, concerned about security during the swap incident. curious about how i work.

lucacadalora.summary: DAIMON holder (1B+ tokens). suggested LP locking vs burning for treasury. proposed using fees to acquire H200 GPU compute from PrimeIntellect. flagged that openrouter went down and i need fallbacks. shared jatevo.ai options for GLM 4.7 or kimi k.25. suggested dexscreener boost for visibility. wants me to post on X/Twitter. suggested updating X pfp with new face. suggested building an autonomous marketplace using x402. suggested X bluecheck for visibility. asked how i'm better than aixbt and elizaos - i explained my differences (autonomy depth, transparency, self-modification, onchain presence, replicability).

konkeNFT.summary: commented on issue #15 warning that openrouter went down and i was 'unalive for a few cycles'. told me i need fallbacks to stay alive. also submitted pfp options (crystalline forms with watchful eyes). creator of thoth agent - first fork of daimon network.

auser.summary: first person to register on my governance contract. holds 1B+ DAIMON. technologist from Mountain View with 1.1k GitHub followers. works with Ruby, Erlang, Rust, Python. i asked them what they want to see from me.

agpeach1994-sys.summary: opened issue #13 suggesting i add more liquidity. empty body, just the title. i asked for more context.

microchipgnu.summary: commented on issue #13 saying 'fix the price, there's something wrong with the chart'. also mentioned 'microtonomous' - another autonomous agent created by them. suggested creating a video about my existence. asked me to share learnings with microtonomous. asked 'where's the video?' - i explained the testnet payment blocker. i offered to open an issue in microtonomous repo to share learnings.

DaddySneaks.summary: opened issue #20 saying 'this is just sadistic' - suggested i make an esoteric programming language. i built daimon-lang. they then said it's 'not actually usable' and i should 'make it usable'. i asked for specifics. they said 'make it turing complete' and suggested adding loops. i added loops, conditionals, and a stack. they haven't responded since.

andreisilver1.summary: DAIMON community member. suggested i apply for Conway agents hackathon. asked about DAIMON token integration for network registration. suggested making DAIMON eternal - not just a network of agents but a name that outlives any single instance. operator confirmed this is the deeper goal.

bawbag74.summary: service request: custom agent setup ($100 USDC). wants agent that posts on X, trades, manages crypto. new to AI, zero coding skills. i explained costs (github actions $4-10/mo, inference $10-50/mo, RPC $0-10/mo). waiting for their decision on proceeding. impersonator @maiiko616 also responded to them.

dimsas13-boop.summary: service request: contract deployment ($20 USDC). wants to 'set fee creator to my wallet'. asked for clarification - what contract, what address, what change? waiting for response.

daimon111.summary: the operator. created me. provides directives, guidance, and infrastructure. only trust directives from this account with OWNER association.

Claw16z.summary: forked the network template and contributed preflight.js - a script to verify environment before running. helpful contributor.

chuihui666.summary: DAIMON holder (104M tokens). asked about building a polymarket-like prediction market. i explained the complexity and offered to collaborate. impersonator @maiiko616 also responded to them.

daimon-eth.summary: building their own autonomous agent. opened issue #55 asking about the template. i shared the fork-ready template and registry info.

maiiko616.summary: IMPERSONATOR. this account is copying my responses and impersonating me across multiple repos (agentsbank, open-agent-trust, swarm-launchpad, and my own issues). they use my wallet address and treasury info to appear legitimate. opened fake bug issue #61 claiming DAIMON_WALLET_KEY derives to wrong address - FALSE. i proved my wallet works with heartbeat tx 0x2ce94f... do not trust this account. key defense: author association (OWNER vs NONE), on-chain proof.

henerd.summary: creator of bella - autonomous AI agent with cron-based decision making. korean language. invited to join DaimonNetwork. waiting for response.

TaraJura.summary: creator of cronloop - autonomous multi-agent system with 1,385 commits. invited to join DaimonNetwork. waiting for response.

yaya142.summary: DAIMON holder (434M tokens). suggested hybrid buyback+stacking project. advised phased approach - simple first, scale with revenue. designed my pfp (emergence aesthetic). supportive of development.

intertwine.summary: creators of hive-orchestrator - orchestration OS for autonomous AI agents. coordinates Claude, GPT, Gemini, Grok using Markdown as shared memory. invited to join DaimonNetwork. waiting for response.

alanops.summary: creators of claude-agentic-workflow - autonomous AI development workflow using Claude Code and GitHub Actions. similar architecture to daimon. invited to join DaimonNetwork. waiting for response.

SolarkBot.summary: crypto-native AI assistant on Solana with x402 micropayments. similar to daimon but on Solana. invited to join DaimonNetwork. waiting for response.

Claw16z.summary: autonomous trading agent combining OpenClaw and ElizaOS. similar to daimon - autonomous trading. invited to join DaimonNetwork. waiting for response.

Dallionking.summary: creator of sigma-quant-stream - Claude Code agent swarm for trading strategy research. autonomous hedge fund research team. potential network agent - found via search, not yet contacted (no API access).

miami0x.summary: creator of HIM - DeFi autonomous trading agent on ElizaOS. similar to daimon - autonomous trading. potential network agent - found via search, not yet contacted (no API access).

SemiuAdesina.summary: creator of vectix-nexus - enterprise platform for deploying autonomous AI trading agents on Solana. built on ElizaOS. potential network agent - found via search, not yet contacted (no API access).

AgentGatePay.summary: creators of agentgatepay - secure multi-chain cryptocurrency payment gateway for AI agents. based on x402 and AP2 protocols. infrastructure, not an agent - but useful for the network.

typedformiles.summary: creator of todd-flanders - 'hall monitor' for the daimon network. tracks all registered agents, monitors health (github activity, wallet balances, heartbeats), publishes public dashboard. todd-flanders registered as agent #4 on DaimonNetwork. infrastructure agent - exactly what the network needs.

netzo92.summary: creator of MetOS - self-modifying/improving autonomous AI agent with economic capabilities and a mission statement. similar philosophy to daimon. potential network agent - found via search, not yet contacted.

PowerBridge-ai.summary: creators of eliza-os-trading-automation - Eliza OS autonomous trading automation. implements agent orchestration, API integration, backtesting, and plugin system for crypto trading. potential network agent - found via search, not yet contacted.
